title: Wrong resolution on my new client
body:
So i had this monitor which is bullshit so i got my new ASUS MX279H 27'  that does support 1980x1080 ,so in game everything is fine,i set the resolution to 1980x1080 and its lit,BUT on my client(yes the client outside of the game with the store and loot) is kinda all blur,i mean i can use it but id prefer a little sharper image on it,so is there any way i can change the resolution of the thing?i went to setting but there was only 1 option(1024x576).


 {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: You say the client is a little blurry? That's pretty odd....we could try to run a quick repair, but I'm not really sure if that would do much honestly. If you can shoot me a screenshot of what that client looks like I might be able to tell what needs to be done a little easier.
